original_text:
But the more they were called,
    the more they went away from me.
They sacrificed to the Baals
    and they burned incense to images.
korean_text: 선지자들이 그들을 부를수록 그들은 점점 멀리하고 바알들에게 제사하며 아로새긴 우상 앞에서 분향하였느니라

sentences.original_text: But the more they were called
the more they went away from me
and they burned incense to images
